title: Mass Effect 1.01a + Bring Down The Sky NO-DVD!
description:
This installs Mass Effect's 1.01a patch and Bring Down the Sky DLC.


1 - Install Mass Effect

2 - Download and extract the file (includes patch 1.01a + BTDS)
      filename: me_101a_bdts_czhuen.rar

4 - Run the file me_101a_bdts_czhuen.exe

3 - Overwrite masseffect.exe to game folder


*Note: I only tested it on a retail version of the game (English version), although the original source said  it also supports CZ/HU language. This is my first upload so please be gentle with me hehe.



I did not made this crack, thanks to trivium (a.k.a. Dark Sector).


And as a sign of thank you... please seed. I have a shitty connection so I'm sorry if your download's such a turtle.

Have fun and enjoy this one.
